title: New: Dee Dee Mayo – It’s Not Hard
content:
Minneapolis based artist Dee Dee Mayo fills the air with some hazy, tropical and beach flavored surf sounds that will have you on your feet in a second.

 It’s Not Hard is a hard to resist ’60s jangly pop maelstrom with a dark vocal twist and a soothing nostalgic ease, a perfect taster for his debut release that’s about to follow.

Dee Dee Mayo Sweats It Out  tape will drop on 19th August via No Problem Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d44
